root.message: The RATIONALE field for indicator 16-2-2, translated into all languages

languages.language: According to the occurrence records, the calculation of this indicator measures the level of prevalence of victims of trafficking, and forms of exploitation.
De acordo com os registos de ocorrências, o cálculo deste indicador mensura o nível de prevalência de vítimas de tráfico, e formas de exploração.
